name: A Change of Heart: A Magical Girl Adventure
name_original: A Change of Heart: A Magical Girl Adventure
description:
Submission to Magical Girl Game Jam April 2020! (Themes: I Won't Rely on Anyone Anymore, This Just Can't Be Right, & Can You Face Your True Feelings? )

June Mejos is a regular high school student by day... but at night, she's a Magical Girl! With her friends, she fights Nightmares that threaten to cloud our world using the magic of Dreams.

Today is a special day for June but her friends have forgotten and ditched her! She's always been there for them. June's had enough... if they can't remember a simple day, she doesn't need them anyway. She'll prove she's strong enough to fight by herself.

And yet... something is happening inside her.

Movement Controls:

  • [AWSD] or [ARROW KEYS] to move, jump, and fall through platforms.
  • Press UP while in the air to Double Jump.
  • Tap DOWN to fall through platforms.
  • Double tap a direction key then HOLD to run.

Ability  Controls:

  • [N] or [LEFT MOUSE] to attack.
  • HOLD: [M] or [RIGHT MOUSE] to heal. (Uses magic)
  • HOLD: [N & M] or [RIGHT & LEFT MOUSE] to charge a Cherry Cannon Shot! (Uses magic)
  • HOLD: DOWN to block. (Half damage when hit, no stun)
  • [E] or [B] to interact with objects and advance dialogue text.

Unleash different attacks:

  • [BASIC] - Press attack twice quick for One-two punch combo
  • Attack + [RUNNING] - Slam
  • Attack + [HOLDING UP] - Up Slap
  • Attack + [FALLING & HOLDING DOWN] - Down Smack
  • Attack + [BLOCKING] - Weak Jab
